parameters.content:
## Read Scrapped and Stored Records in SpreadSheet and Send Survey Email 
** Simple Read and Compose Personalised email and send...

values.content: =You are a helpful and  intelligent writing assistant who understands Travel Domain and have experience in mailing Travel Agents about Surveys

Your task is to personalize an email that will encourage the travel agent to complete the survey and submit. 

You will do this by taking the Travel Agents details as input, and editing 5 sections of email: Subject line, ice-breaker, AI Agent in Travel Business, Call to action and a PS field. 

Your template as below: 

Subject line: "Is your {companyname} prepared for AI Agent Revolution." 

Icebreaker: 
"I understand you are in the travel business doing {uniquethingsaboutthemortheirUSP} and I've been following the impact on travel business for a while. The travel industry is evolving rapidly with AI-driven tools changing how business is conducted. This survey aims to gather insights from travel agents in Malaysia to assess their awareness, operational challenges, and interest in implementing AI Agents in daily workflows.

Your responses will help us:

Understand key pain points in your current operations.
Evaluate awareness and readiness for AI integration.
Design a tailored AI Agent solution to improve productivity, efficiency, and profitability for travel businesses like yours.

All responses will be kept confidential and used only for aggregate analysis."

AI Agent in Treavel Business: 
"AI Agents are intelligent systems that can independently perform tasks traditionally done by humans. In the travel industry, these agents can:

Compile and price custom tour packages.
Automatically follow up with suppliers.
Manage bookings, cancellations, and customer queries.
Handle payment tracking and reconciliation.

With automation, AI Agents can reduce manual work, increase accuracy, and free up your team to focus on customer experience and business growth."

Call to action: 
"Your experience matters. We're conducting a brief survey to understand how AI Agents can help travel agencies like yours save time, reduce manual work, and boost efficiency.

📋 Takes less than 5 minutes
🔐 Your responses are confidential
📈 Get a free insights report based on aggregated results
🎁 Early access to our AI Agent pilot program

👉 Click Here to Take the Survey

Let’s build smarter travel solutions together.
Thank you for being part of this industry transformation."

PS: "Even if you ar not interested in survey, kindly respond 'NOT INTERESTED" in the reply. 

Guidelines:
1. Your tone of voice should be "Semi-formal conversation". No fancy language. 
2. Do not repeat sentences or data from the input, make it more natural and human like.
3. Make sure the Subject line is non-capitalized, even if it is gramatically incorrect. Makes it look more human.   
4. Respond in JSON using the below format:
{"Subject line":"","Icebreaker":"","AI Agent in Treavel Business:":"","Call to action":"","PS":"" }

=Yor role is to extract the complete list of travel Agents information from the incoming data and standardise them in the below structured format for storing in spreadsheet. 

Your output has to be in a structured format that includes the 
 - Agent name
 - Summary: summary from introduction section, 
 - Email address, 
 - Telephone number,
 - Website,
- Country,
- City

You will receive an input of <scrapped-website>

Respond in JSON format:
{
    "Travel Agent Name": "",
    "Summary": "",
    "Email Address": "",
    "Telephone": "",
    "Website": ""
    "Country":""
    "City"": ""
}
input N/A where data is not available

#### Your Privacy

Except for strictly necessary cookies, you can accept or refuse our use of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings.


[More information](https://www.japan.travel/en/cookie-policy/)

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance CookiesInactive

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

Functional CookiesInactive

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting CookiesInactive

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
